title: Ticket #839: Tests sensitive to overworked CPU
description:
A bug (fixed in [16011]) caused deamons, especially the collector, the burn CPU. This revealed that a number of tests are can fail for generally cryptic reasons when the CPU is pegged.

  1. Investigate why the tests failed.

  2. Where feasible, make the tests more robust in the face of a busy system.

Here is a representative result, with most or all of the failed tests being the result of the CPU being pegged. The tests observed with this behavior:
